dmca.title: use of my in vulgar and sexual content
dmca.body:
Hi please delete the http://www.orkut.com/Profile.aspx?uid=302592412541611112 persons profile from orkut account as she is using my pic for sexual and vulgar content.my orkut profile id is 
http://www.orkut.com/Profile.aspx?uid=3725990182881675014.i hope the needful is done as soon.thanking u.regards.
